duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, configuration, and maintenance of the information technology infrastructure including servers, SAN, network switches, storage, and other technologies.
Assessment of performance of systems, capacity planning, and growth projections.
Continuous maintenance and improvement of the environment to provide high levels of service to the user base.
Deployment projects of new systems, including design, architecture, deployment, configurations, and training.
Maintenance of proficiency within the IT industry, including certifications, self-study, and attendance of technical conferences.
Assisting with help desk tickets and end-user support when required.
Performing other departmental duties as required, including project work and long-term items.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, or a related field of study
